pending-determination.description: We need to confirm your eligibility for benefits.

base-pending.description: Your payments are pending further review.
base-pending.next-step: Check your UI Online inbox for the latest updates.

base-no-pending-active.description: Your claim is active and there are no pending issues at this time.

base-no-pending-inactive.description: There are no pending issues at this time.

conditional-next-steps.certify-no-pending: <0>Keep certifying</0> as long as you need benefits.
conditional-next-steps.certify-pending: <0>Keep certifying</0> as long as you need benefits, so your payments are not delayed further.
conditional-next-steps.contact-info: Make sure we have your current phone number and email address.
